## 随机变量

### 读取数据

```{r read data}
setwd("~/Documents/R_and_statics/statics/")
dat <- read.csv("femaleMiceWeights.csv")
```

### 查看前几行
```{r head}
head(dat)
```

### 计算不同平均值

```{r mean}
library(dplyr)

control <- dat %>% 
  filter(Diet == "chow") %>%   
  select(Bodyweight) %>% 
  unlist()

treatment <- dat %>% 
  filter(Diet == "hf") %>%     
  select(Bodyweight) %>% 
  unlist()

mean(treatment)
mean(control)


obsdiff <- mean(treatment) - mean(control)
print(obsdiff)
```
